body: Hi, I'm ShadowSlayerZ7 and I'm starting my first forum post. Feel free to talk to me or talk about any issues in-game. My friend, Splade (who I know irl) showed me the server a little while ago and I started getting into it 2-ish weeks ago and if you look at my K/D and are not impressed I mainly rush on Nebula so...yea. You'll see me sniping in Decay though.

Hey there!
Welcome to the forums :)
If you ever have questions to ask, please don't hesitate to contact me or any other of the friendly staff here! We'll be more than happy to help ^-^

replies.body:
Your title is "What's up"

So I have to define up, right?


UP is a movie, it also means a direction, the direction that goes above you. The opposite of down. It is a symbol of heaven.



JKJK

xDDDDDDDDD

Well anyways, yeah, welcome to the forums. Enjoy your stay and remember to have fun! :D
